synopsis.text: Bringing the spotlight to two ambitious middle school girls, Momoyama Mirai and Moegi Emo, this anime follows their journey into the world of Pri☆Chan idols. Leveraging the popular 'Pri☆Chan System,' a platform often utilized by celebrities and corporations for broadcasting content, the duo takes a leap of faith by creating their own channel. Inspired by their classmate and existing Pri☆Chan Idol, Akagi Anna, they aspire to carve out their own niche in the glittering world of idol stardom. Joined by the academically gifted Aoba Rinka, the trio embarks on a thrilling adventure to produce captivating content and ultimately achieve their dream of becoming Pri☆Chan Idols. Will they rise to the challenge and leave their mark in the competitive world of Pri☆Chan? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
